name: THE CAPE TOWN CAPER
description:
AHOY!

A flood is coming to South Africa, and Noah must rescue animals in his land boat in this 3D Endless Runner that combines Noah's Ark with Madagascar 2!

This is the result of a two week Game Jam at London South Bank University. On Tuesday week 1, we were given the prompt "Road Trip - Cape Town", and by Friday we had a prototype. You can play the week 1 version here: https://games-by-harry-x.itch.io/the-cape-town-caper-part-1

On  Tuesday week 2, we were given a bunch of helpful feedback and the 1 word prompt "Water". We decided to spend the next few days fixing bugs, adding polish and visual tweaks and, of course, water. Also lore. Deep lore.

Thanks to everyone who plays, to Andy and LSBU and especially to my team for working so hard, you guys were a pleasure to work with and made being a producer actually fun (which 3 years ago would have sounded impossible).

LADSONTOUR STUDIOS - THE TEAM

Alex - Programmer

Marcos - 3D Modelling & Art

Eliot - 3D Modelling, Menu Script 

Hoang - 3D Modelling & Art:  https://www.instagram.com/zerostyle_art/

Kasim - 3D Modelling + Particle FX 

Jack - 3D Modelling

Anthony - Art

Tommy - SFX & Art:  https://tomiico.itch.io/

Act Ishikawa - Music: https://twitter.com/ActIshikawa?s=20 

Harry - Producer/Captain:  https://linktr.ee/linksbyharry
